findings.title: No way to burn tokens externally
findings.description: _burn() and _burnFrom() are internal functions. So they cannot be called externally from the smart contract if the owner of the token wants to burn some supply.

findings.title: Renounce Ownership
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function is used in smart contracts to renounce ownership. Otherwise, if the contract's ownership has not been transferred previously, it will never have an Owner, which is risky.
